means: [男子名] 吉恩 Eugene的昵称
[女子名] 吉恩 Eugenia的昵称

word_mean: 遗传因子：脱氧核糖核酸分子段，包含合成某一产物(多肽链或核糖核酸分子)所需要的全部信息，包括密码和非密码顺序。基因是遗传和自身繁殖的生物学单位
并通过双亲传给子代。每个基因在染色体图上有一特定的位置(座位)。从功能观点看，可把基因设想为构造基因、操作基因和调节基因。(见二级词条)
存在于细胞内有自体复制能力的遗传物质单位。
遗传信息的基本单位。一般指位于染色体上编码一个特定功能产物（如蛋白质或RNA分子等）的一段核苷酸序列。

sentence.Network_en: He found evidence of mutated forms of the gene.
sentence.Network_cn: 他找到了该基因出现了变异形式的证据。

sentence.Network_en: It is far too early to make sweeping statements about gene therapy.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在对基因疗法下结论还为时过早。

sentence.Network_en: The gene is only part of the causation of illness.
sentence.Network_cn: 基因只是致病的部分原因。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...色体理论，认为“遗传因子”就位于染色体上。1909年，约翰森（Johannsen）将遗传因子定义为“基因”(gene)。1910年，美国科学家摩尔根和他的助手在果蝇试验中，发现了连锁定律和交换定律，这两大定律弥补了孟德.
高一英语词汇表 ... genetically adv. 由基因决定的；与遗传有关的 gene n. 基因；（遗传）因子 modify vt. 更改；修改；修饰.
gene 喉癌, gene 基因的, gene 基因枪
中文狗名大全 ... Frank 法兰克法国自由之人 Gene 吉恩希腊，拉丁有高贵血统的 Geoffrey 杰佛理法国神圣的和平.

list.abs: 又叫基因库（gene pool）。 一个物种、或者一个品种是一个最大的孟德尔群体。
基因工程(gene engineering)是20世纪70年代以后兴起的一门新技术，即用人工的方法，把遗传物质DNA分离出来，在体外进行基因 …
基因突变（gene mutation）是由于DNA分子中发生碱基对的增添、缺失或替换，而引起的基因结构的改变，就叫做基因突变。1个基 …
基因表达(gene expression)是指细胞在生命过程中，把储存在DNA顺序中遗传信息经过转录和翻译，转变成具有生物活性的蛋白质分子。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from German Gen, from Pangen, a supposed ultimate unit of heredity (from Greek pan- 'all' + genos 'race, kind, offspring')

entry.def: A gene is the part of a cell in a living thing which controls its physical characteristics, growth, and development.

means.word_mean: 1. (genetics) a segment of DNA that is involved in producing a polypeptide chain; it can include regions preceding and following the coding DNA as well as introns between the exons; it is considered a unit of heredity;

auth_sentence.content: One might say that no gene is an island.
auth_sentence.res_content: One might say that no gene is an island.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One might say that no gene is an island.

auth_sentence.content: Light given off revealed that the gene became active.
auth_sentence.res_content: Light given off revealed that the gene became active.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Light given off revealed that the gene became active.

Sentence.sentence: All of these are influenced by the interaction of your genes and the environment in which you were raised.
The study of how genes and environment interact to influence psychological activity is known as behavioral genetics
Who wants to be told that there are limitations to what you can achieve based on something that is beyond your control, such as your genes?

When you see things like Ford moving new production from Mexico to Detroit, instead of the other way around, you know things are changing," says Gene Sperling, director of the National Economic Council.

sentences.en: You have good genes from your parents, so you should live a long time.
sentences.cn: 你从父母那儿获得优良的基因, 所以能够活得很长。

jushi.english: You have good genes from your parents, so you should live a long time.
jushi.chinese: 你从父母那儿获得优良的基因,所以能够活得很长。
